altTitle: 7th Time Loop: The Villainess Enjoys a Carefree Life Married to Her Worst Enemy!
ループ7回目の悪役令嬢は、元敵国で自由気ままな花嫁生活を満喫する
The Villain Daughter Enjoys Her Seventh Life as a Free-Spirited Bride (Hostage) in a Former Enemy Country
title: Loop 7-kaime no Akuyaku Reijou wa, Moto Tekikoku de Jiyuu Kimamana Hanayome Seikatsu wo Mankitsu Suru
